Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or supporting information to prove that the photo depicts the last rites of Bhagat Singh, Sukhdev, and Rajguru.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is related to the funeral of the three freedom fighters without concrete evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by panthic.org, discoversikhism.com, babushahi.com, and news.drgurbani.com, which state that the photo actually shows the cremation of 13 Sikhs who were killed in 1978.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the historical fact that the bodies of Bhagat Singh, Sukhdev, and Rajguru were cremated on the banks of the Sutlej river near Firozpur, not in a public funeral.
Understate: The claim may understate the significance of the actual event depicted in the photo, which is the cremation of 13 Sikhs who were killed in 1978.
